description: See co- and Latin adūnō (“I unite, make one”).

adjectives.description: coadunate (comparative more coadunate, superlative most coadunate)

verbs.description: coadunate (third-person singular simple present coadunates, present participle coadunating, simple past and past participle coadunated)

entries.meaning: To merge; to unite into one.
